title: Ticket #186: Allow a job to act as a POST script to another job
description: Todd M just talked to me -- he's having issues with the fact that you can't get output from PRE and POST scripts in DAGMan. One thing he proposed is adding the capability to run an actual Condor job in a way that duplicates the functionality of a POST script in terms of the DAG semantics (the "secondary" job would be able to get the return value of the "primary" job, defines the node return value, etc.). I'm not sure whether the best thing is to actually have a "primary" and a "secondary" job within a single node, or somehow tie two nodes together.
